page.title: 06Crown Inn Hotel,Whitebrook 2
page.content: In the Crown Inn Hotel there is accommodation for 15 guests .The hotel employs 8 people ,4 of whom are local. Some of the staff are French. Their work involves buying food & wine, storing and preparing the food, cleaning, laundering and gardening. Most of their produce is bought locally from Monmouth, Cwmbran or Abergavenny. Between two and three thousand people visit the hotel annually. Visitors seek information at the hotel about beauty spots, places of interest, leisure activities and local history. Many are interested in the old paper mills and wire works in the Whitebrook Valley.
